tours.name: Historic Walking Tour
tours.description: Explore the rich history of our city on a guided walking tour through its oldest neighborhoods and landmarks.

tours.name: Wine Tasting Tour
tours.description: Sample some of the region's finest wines on a tour of the best wineries and vineyards in the area.

tours.name: Adventure Tour
tours.description: Experience the thrill of outdoor adventure on a tour that includes hiking, rock climbing, and zip lining.

tours.name: Foodie Tour
tours.description: Indulge your taste buds on a culinary tour of the city's best restaurants, cafes, and food trucks.

tours.name: Beach Tour
tours.description: Soak up the sun and enjoy the sand and surf on a tour of the best beaches in the area.
